languages.text: Шпики, приставленные к культу, проявили неосторожность и выдали себя, что заставило проповедника и его секту уйти в подполье. Мостик и авгур-палуба потеряла несколько ключевых офицеров, которые предпочли отправиться в изгнание на нижние палубы следом за своим "мессией" и скрываться от блюстителей пустотного корабля.

The spies sent to keep an eye on the cult were careless and gave themselves away, sending the prophet and his cult into hiding. The bridge and the augur deck lost several key officers who chose to follow their "messiah" into exile to the lower decks, where it is easier to avoid the voidship's enforcers.
languages.original_text: Шпики, приставленные к культу, проявили неосторожность и выдали себя, что заставило проповедника и его секту уйти в подполье. Мостик и авгур-палуба потеряла несколько ключевых офицеров, которые предпочли отправиться в изгнание на нижние палубы следом за своим "мессией" и скрываться от блюстителей пустотного корабля.

traits.locale_text: The spies sent to keep an eye on the cult were careless and gave themselves away, which made the prophet and his cult go into hiding. The bridge and the augur deck lost several key officers who chose to follow their "messiah" into exile to the lower decks where it is easier to avoid the guards of the voidfaring vessel.

The spies sent to keep an eye on the cult were careless and gave themselves away, which made the prophet and his cult go into hiding. The bridge and the augur deck lost several key officers who chose to follow their "messiah" into exile to the lower decks where it is easier to avoid the guards of the voidfaring vessel.

The spies sent to keep an eye on the cult were careless and gave themselves away, sending the prophet and his cult into hiding. The bridge and the augur deck lost several key officers who chose to follow their "messiah" into exile to the lower decks, where it is easier to avoid the voidship's guards.

The spies sent to keep an eye on the cult were careless and gave themselves away, sending the prophet and his cult into hiding. The bridge and the augur deck lost several key officers who chose to follow their "messiah" into exile to the lower decks, where it is easier to avoid the voidship's guards.

The spies sent to keep an eye on the cult were careless and gave themselves away, sending the prophet and his cult into hiding. The bridge and the augur deck lost several key officers who chose to follow their "messiah" into exile to the lower decks, where it is easier to avoid the voidship's enforcers.

languages.text: 派去监视教派的间谍不小心暴露了身份，先知和他的追随者们躲了起来。舰桥和扫描甲板失去了几名重要军官。为了躲避舰船上的执法者，这些军官选择追随他们的“弥赛亚”，流亡到了下层甲板。
languages.original_text: The spies sent to keep an eye on the cult were careless and gave themselves away, sending the prophet and his cult into hiding. The bridge and the augur deck lost several key officers who chose to follow their "messiah" into exile to the lower decks, where it is easier to avoid the voidship's enforcers.

traits.locale_text: 派去监视教派的间谍不小心暴露了身份，先知和他的追随者们躲了起来。舰桥和扫描甲板失去了几名重要军官。为了躲避舰船上的镇压者，这些军官选择追随他们的“弥赛亚”，流亡到了下层甲板。

languages.text: Los espías enviados para vigilar al culto se descuidaron y se delataron, enviando al profeta y a su culto a la clandestinidad. El puente y la cubierta de augures perdieron a varios oficiales clave que optaron por seguir a su «mesías» y exiliarse a las cubiertas inferiores, donde es más fácil evitar a los vigilantes de la nave del vacío.
languages.original_text: The spies sent to keep an eye on the cult were careless and gave themselves away, sending the prophet and his cult into hiding. The bridge and the augur deck lost several key officers who chose to follow their "messiah" into exile to the lower decks, where it is easier to avoid the voidship's enforcers.

traits.locale_text: Los espías enviados para vigilar al culto se descuidaron y se delataron, enviando al profeta y a su culto a la clandestinidad. El puente y la cubierta de augures perdieron a varios oficiales clave que optaron por seguir a su «mesías» y exiliarse a las cubiertas inferiores, donde es más fácil evitar a los vigilantes de la nave del vacío.

languages.text: 教団の監視に送られたスパイ達はうっかりボロを出して、預言者とその教団に囚われてしまう。ブリッジとスキャナーデッキは、己の「メシア」に従うと決めた重要な士官を何人も失った。彼らはヴォイドシップの執行官から逃れやすい下位デッキに亡命した。
languages.original_text: The spies sent to keep an eye on the cult were careless and gave themselves away, sending the prophet and his cult into hiding. The bridge and the augur deck lost several key officers who chose to follow their "messiah" into exile to the lower decks, where it is easier to avoid the voidship's enforcers.

traits.locale_text: 教団の監視に送られたスパイ達はうっかりボロを出して、預言者とその教団に囚われてしまう。ブリッジとスキャナーデッキは、己の「メシア」に従うと決めた重要な士官を何人も失った。彼らはヴォイドシップの執行官から逃れやすい下位デッキに亡命した。

languages.text: Les espions envoyés pour surveiller la secte font preuve d'imprudence et sont repérés, ce qui pousse le prophète et ses fidèles à se dissimuler. La passerelle et le pont des augures perdent plusieurs officiers importants qui choisissent de s'exiler avec leur nouveau « messie » sur les ponts inférieurs, où ils pourront plus facilement éviter les prévôts.
languages.original_text: The spies sent to keep an eye on the cult were careless and gave themselves away, sending the prophet and his cult into hiding. The bridge and the augur deck lost several key officers who chose to follow their "messiah" into exile to the lower decks, where it is easier to avoid the voidship's enforcers.

traits.locale_text: Les espions envoyés pour surveiller la secte font preuve d'imprudence et sont repérés, ce qui pousse le prophète et ses fidèles à se dissimuler. La passerelle et le pont des augures perdent plusieurs officiers importants qui choisissent de s'exiler avec leur nouveau « messie » sur les ponts inférieurs, où ils pourront plus facilement éviter les prévôts.

languages.text: Die Spione, die geschickt wurden, um den Kult zu beobachten, waren unvorsichtig und haben sich selbst verraten. Der Prophet und sein Kult tauchten unter. Die Brücke und das Augurendeck verloren mehrere wichtige Offiziere, die ihrem "Messias" ins Exil auf die Unterdecks folgten, wo man den Enforcers des Raumschiffs leichter entgehen kann.
languages.original_text: The spies sent to keep an eye on the cult were careless and gave themselves away, sending the prophet and his cult into hiding. The bridge and the augur deck lost several key officers who chose to follow their "messiah" into exile to the lower decks, where it is easier to avoid the voidship's enforcers.

Die Brücke und das Augurendeck verloren mehrere wichtige Offiziere, die ihrem "Messias" ins Exil auf die Unterdecks folgten, wo man den Enforcers des Raumschiffs leichter entgehen kann.

languages.text: Tarikatı izlemekle görevlendirilen casuslar, dikkatsizlikleriyle kendilerini açığa çıkardı. Bu durum, peygamberin ve tarikatının saklanmasına neden oldu. Köprü ve alamet güvertesi, sözde mesihi takip eden ve alt güvertelerde saklanmayı tercih eden birkaç önemli subayını kaybetti.
languages.original_text: The spies sent to keep an eye on the cult were careless and gave themselves away, sending the prophet and his cult into hiding. The bridge and the augur deck lost several key officers who chose to follow their "messiah" into exile to the lower decks, where it is easier to avoid the voidship's enforcers.
